CustomField.inlineHelpText: The utility account number format. Places groups of numbers in the desired format and uses regex capture groups as placeholders. Include prefix if applicable. Ex: for UANs formatted XXX-XXX-XX the UAN Format value is $1-$2-$3. for UANs with prefix R01 and formatted R01-XXX-XXX the UAN Format value is R01-$1-$2.
CustomField.label: UAN Format
